description: Lucky numbers both palindromic and prime.
links: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..66
mathematica: lst = Range[1, 10^6, 2]; i = 2; While[lst[[i]] <= Length[lst], del = Partition[Range[lst[[i]], Length[lst], lst[[i]]], 1]; lst = Delete[lst, del]; i++ ]; lst = Select[lst, PrimeQ[ # ] &]; lst = Select[lst, (ToString[ # ] == StringReverse[ToString[ # ]]) &]
author: _Patrick De Geest_
extensions: Corrected and extended by Vit Planocka (planocka(AT)mistral.cz), Jan 31 2003
